description:
A non-unique basic attack- oft the default skill.
Mostly a melee attack.
name: Attack

description:
A non-unique basic attack- oft the default skill.
Definitely a ranged attack.
name: Attack

description: The first hit of a three-hit slash combo.
name: Slash

description: The second hit of a three-hit slash combo.
name: Slash

description:
The final hit of a three-hit slash combo.
Slashes all enemies in its path.
name: Slash

description: The first hit of a four-hit pierce combo.
name: Thrust

description: The second hit of a four-hit pierce combo.
name: Thrust

description:
The third hit of a four-hit pierce combo.
Pierces all enemies in its path.
name: Thrust

description:
The final hit of a four-hit pierce combo.
Pierces all enemies in its path.
name: Thrust

description:
The only hit of a one-hit gun combo.
It is a gun afterall, just pull the trigger really fast.
name: Gunshot

description: The first hit of a three-hit slash combo.
name: Cleave

description: The second hit of a three-hit slash combo.
name: Cleave

description:
The final hit of a three-hit slash combo.
Slashes all enemies and sends them flying back.
name: Cleave

description: Fires a wave of energy that can hit multiple targets.
name: Wave

description: Fires a ball of energy that hits the first enemy it encounters.
name: Ball

description: Fires a pair of balls of energy that each hit the first enemy they encounter.
name: Shot

description: Fires a trio of energy balls that hits the first enemy encountered.
name: Spray

description: Fires a quad of energy balls that hits the first enemy encountered.
name: Cross

description: Fires an octet of energy balls that hits the first enemy encountered.
name: Burst

description: The first hit of a five-hit blunt combo.
name: Punch

description: The second hit of a five-hit blunt combo.
name: Punch

description: The third hit of a five-hit blunt combo.
name: Punch

description: The fourth hit of a five-hit blunt combo.
name: Punch

description:
The fifth hit of a five-hit blunt combo.
Continuing to combo will perform "fist flare".
name: Punch

description:
The fist flare allows for rapid attacks to wittle
your enemies to dust.
name: Flow

description:
The first of a two-hit water combo.
Smites the nearest foe directly with a blast of water.
name: Pop

description:
The final hit of a two-hit water combo.
Smites all nearby foes directly with a blast of water.
name: Pop

description: Mercilessly destroys otherwise-invincible rocks and spires.
name: Crush Rocks

description: Blows up after a few seconds, obliterating anything near it.
name: Time Bomb

description: Lunge forward at high speeds 2 spaces!
name: Lunge

description: Backstep quickly 2 spaces!
name: Backstep

description: Tumble in a designated direction 3 spaces!
name: Tumble

description: Damage reduction: -33%. Precision parrying: 6 frames.
name: Guard (-33%)

description: Damage reduction: -20. Precision parrying: 12 frames.
name: Deflect (-20)

description: Damage reduction: -33% then -20.
name: Brace (-33%/-20)

description:
Damage reduction: -25%. Precision parrying: 6 frames.
Retaliates when the guard is successful (excludes precision parrying).
name: Guard-Counter (-25%)

description:
Damage reduction: -10. Precision parrying: 8 frames.
Retaliates when the precision parry is successful.
name: Deflect-Counter (-10)

description:
Damage reduction: -40%.
Counterblazes when the guard is successful.
name: Guard-Blaze (-40%)

description:
Damage reduction: -33% then -40.
Retaliates when the guard is successful (excludes precision parrying).
name: Brace-Counter (-33%/-40)

description:
Damage reduction: -10. Precision parrying: 30 frames.
Self-inflicts a critical boost state when precise-parrying.
name: Deflect-Boost (-10)

description:
Nullifies incoming damage.
Has a guard-counter-gigashock.
name: Gigablock (-100%)

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage.
Triggered as a retaliation when guarding or precise-parrying.
name: Counterattack

description:
Sprays a triad of moderate damage fireballs infront of you.
Triggered as a retaliation when guarding.
name: Counterblaze

description:
Deals a small amount of heat-elemental damage to the attacker.
May burn(10%) with each hit.
name: Burning Body

description:
Deals a small amount of void-elemental damage to the attacker.
May exhaust(10%) with each hit.
name: Ghostly Body

description: Grants a momentary boost of crit and damage after a precise-parry.
name: Accelerate

description:
Rapidly regenerates health in response to being struck.
While regenerating, the user is unable to take action.
name: Mitosis

description:
A thorn-like retaliation skill.
Deals a small amount of damage on hit.
name: Basic Thorns

description:
A thorn-like retaliation skill.
Deals a moderate amount of damage on hit.
name: Sharp Thorns

description:
A thorn-like retaliation skill.
Deals a significant amount of damage on hit.
name: Deadly Thorns

Flames erupt from all around you, dealing moderate heat-elemental damage to all nearby foes.
Especially effective versus shielded enemies.

description:
Afflicts the caster with "Liquiguvenation I".
Rejuvenates 5% MP immediately, and another 30% over 10 seconds.
name: Liquiguvenation I

description:
Afflicts the caster with "Liquiguvenation II".
Rejuvenates 10% MP immediately, and another 40% over 10 seconds.
name: Liquiguvenation II

description:
Afflicts the caster with "Liquiguvenation III".
Rejuvenates 20% MP immediately, and another 50% over 10 seconds.
name: Liquiguvenation III

description: Like a basic attack, but hits up to two times, and from a distance.
name: Twin Stinger

description:
An empowered basic attack. May poison(50%).
Poison causes damage over time.
name: Poison Needle

description:
An empowered basic attack. May disable(50%).
Disable prevents the use of basic attacks (mainhand/offhand skills).
name: Disabling Burst

description:
An empowered ranged basic attack. May mute(50%).
Mute prevents the use of non-basic-attack skills (L1/R1 skills).
name: Muted Shot

description:
Fires off a ripple in 8 directions that damages any nearby targets.
Not strong, but may root(50%).
name: Rooting Tendrils

description:
An empowered basic attack. May paralyze(50%).
Paralysis prevents movement and all skill usage- including basic attacks.
name: Paralysis Stab

description:
A weak fireball from a trap.
Deals (30 - MDF) damage.
name: Fireball Trap

description:
A heat-elemental strike dealing moderate damage to those 
in melee range. May burn the target.
name: Heated Strike

description: A heat-elemental version of the Ranged Attack.
name: Fire Shot

description:
A big and angry heavy blow like from a bear or something.
May stun(33%) and bleed(66%).
name: Heavy Blow

description:
Deals light liquid-element damage because kappa's slaps are offensive.
May mute(66%) and disable(66%).
name: Kappa Slap

description:
Bites a single target.
Deals a light amount of poke damage.
name: Bat Bite

description:
Flaps wings to stir up quite a breeze!
Deals cut damage in a line and may stun(33%).
name: Wing Flap

description:
Fires an enormous-but-slow fireball straight ahead.
Will likely burn(80%) and ignores the target's parry chance.
name: Willow's Flame

description:
A dangerously strong blow that deals heavy damage and knocks
the target way back.
name: Maxotaur Chop

description:
Touches your target with the hands of death.
Absorbs all damage dealt as life.
name: Death's Touch

description:
Seals the caster's ability to perform skills, but grants a
light life regeneration and a small boost in power and force.
name: Rage Growth

description:
Drains a small amount of Magi(50 + 10%).
May inflict disable(50%).
name: Jelluminance

description:
Smites the nearest foe directly with a sudden stone crush.
Always strikes the nearest target. May stun(20%).
name: Earth Crush

description:
Heals all allies nearby the caster for a small amount.
Grants "Fae-Regen I".
name: Faerie Heal

description:
A quick stab at the target that ignores a most of the target's defense.
May cause bleeding(40%).
name: Shank

description:
Shake the ground with the might of something very mighty!
Knocks all enemies nearby back a significant distance.
name: Shockwave

description:
A swift rake with possibly infected claws.
May inflict poison(33%) and bleeding(33%).
name: Slobber Slash

description:
Whips the target with their tongue to soften defenses and drain magi.
Likely to inflict Soften Endurance(80%) and Soften Resist(80%).
name: Tonguewhip

description:
Takes a bite out of the target.
Just deals a ton of damage and absorbs life from damage dealt.
name: Devour

description:
Bites a single target, dealing a light poke damage
and possibly poisoning(~5x10%) them five times.
name: Crawler Bite

description:
Slams the ground and generates a spume of literal void.
Pulse once per second for 5 seconds. May poison(30%).
name: Void Spiral

description: A liquid-elemental version of the Ranged Attack.
name: Water Shot

description:
A dangerous swing in an arc in front of you.
Deals moderate weapon damage scaling with the user's current health.
name: Ferocious Swing

description:
Attempts to liquify all living entities within reach.
Melts a target and absorbs that matter into itself.
name: Liquify
